%title /ab/experiments/{experimentId}/alternatives/{alternativeId}/rule-params GET 返回一个指定Alternative的分配规则参数  

=/ab/experiments/{experimentId}/alternatives/{alternativeId}/rule-params GET=

==功能 ==
返回一个指定的候选方案 `Alternative` 的分配规则参数

==URL==
/ab/experiments/{experimentId}/alternatives/{alternativeId}/rule-params

==HTTP请求方式==
GET

==请求类型==
无

==请求参数==
* 路径参数
| 参数名        | 值     | 描述                  |
|---------------|--------|-----------------------|
| experimentId  | String | 要查询的 `Experiment` |
| alternativeId | String | 对应的 `Alternative`  |
 
==返回格式==
JSON XML

==返回结果==
| 状态 | 结果     |
|------|----------|
| 200  | 查询成功 |

# XML Reslut:
{{{ class="brush:xml"
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
                <ruleParams>
                    <url>http://localhost:8080/ab-service/experiments/2/alternatives/7/rule-params</url>
                    <param1>30</param1>
                </ruleParams>
  }}}
# Json Reslut:

{{{ class="brush:js"

                {
                    "url": "http://localhost:8080/ab-service/experiments/2/alternatives/7/rule-params",
                    "param1": "30",
                    "param2": null,
                    "param3": null,
                    "param4": null,
                    "param5": null,
                    "param6": null,
                    "param7": null,
                    "param8": null,
                    "param9": null
                }
  }}}

==测试==
{{{ class="brush:bash"
curl  -HAcccept:application/xml  https://baseurl/experiments/{experimentId}/alternatives/{alternativeId}/rule-params
curl  -HAcccept:application/json https://baseurl/experiments/{experimentId}/alternatives/{alternativeId}/rule-params
  }}}
